io.doov.core.dsl.time

Class TemporalAdjuster

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.doov.core.dsl.time.TemporalAdjuster

  • public class TemporalAdjuster
extends java.lang.Object
    Common and useful temporal adjusters. This class wraps TemporalAdjuster to add metadata information to each adjusters.
